LanguageData.GR_AnimalControlHub.label: центр контроля животных
LanguageData.GR_AnimalControlHub.description: Once the animal control hub is active in your map, you can access new abilities in your hybrids, allowing you to control them directly.
LanguageData.GR_AnimalControlHub_Blueprint.label: центр контроля животных (чертеж)
LanguageData.GR_AnimalControlHub_Frame.label: центр контроля животных (стройка)
LanguageData.GR_AnimalControlHub_Frame.description: Once the animal control hub is active in your map, you can access new abilities in your hybrids, allowing you to control them directly.
